# baldur

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of baldur is to shine light on your proteomics data.

## Installation

You can install the development version of baldur like so:

``` r
require(devtools)
#devtools::install_github('PhilipBerg/baldur', build_vignettes = T)
```
